name: Fantasytaker
description:
Marisa woke up with a dream.
Harem full of youkai girls.

It was, however, not an easy dream to achieve.
It could cost her her life.

"When cute girls are involved, no price is too high.",
She said as she ventured into the night.

"And if I pick up some loot on the way...
No harm done, right?"

Parody of Helltaker, a free game on Steam.

A (very) short puzzle game made for Touhou Pride Jam 2 in 72 hours. The jam allotted two weeks, but I was not struck with this genius idea until there were only three days left. oops.

If you get stuck, there's a guide here.
